themes.theme: Dependency on Other Teams or Resources
themes.description: Work was delayed because required input or resources from other teams were not available in time.
examples: will require design help from cadence and hi
awaiting bi assignment
please assign the appropriate resource

themes.description: Design or build could not proceed due to pending approval or sign-off from operational stakeholders.
examples: meeting with operations is just now getting scheduled
operational signoff and approval
issues getting operational sign off

themes.description: Design work was not finalized early enough in the release cycle, causing missed deadlines.
examples: design cannot be completed until marketing sets up time with the vendor
design meetings have been ongoing since September
design session scheduled after release deadline

themes.description: New requirements or policy changes expanded the scope, making original timelines unachievable.
examples: added in changes based on an updated policy for 2026
guidelines had changed somewhat again
additional functionality must be enabled

themes.description: Meetings or demos were scheduled too late or repeatedly rescheduled, delaying progress.
examples: meeting scheduled for 10 28 with operational stakeholders
demo scheduled 11 3 go live scheduled 11 17
meeting pending?

themes.description: Potential delays were not flagged during stand-ups or status updates until very close to deadlines.
examples: i'd like to have known about it sooner than 3 days before the deadline
these things are 'lessons learned' moving forward
risk here was not brought up during stand-ups

themes.description: Unanticipated technical challenges or unclear workflows required extra investigation.
examples: need to review the association of baby to mother
concerns of patient safety in areas outside of ed
interface has very little flexibility

themes.description: Operational teams were not ready with documentation, training, or process updates.
examples: operations still need to flesh out their written protocols
procedure documentation, competencies, and education pending
delays in getting information from the requesters

themes.description: Progress was blocked waiting for actions from external vendors or partners.
examples: marketing sets up time with the vendor perficient
waiting on vendor coordination
dependent on external system updates

themes.description: Key team members were unavailable due to other priorities or time off.
examples: nick is also ooo for the next 2 weeks
bi did not have availability
internal resource unavailable due to other high priority things
